sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.SMDynamicManualServicePopulator</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Populator for dynamic manual services, provided by Service Mapping</description>
        <name>SMDynamicManualServicePopulator</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var SMDynamicManualServicePopulator = Class.create();
SMDynamicManualServicePopulator.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractApplicationServicePopulator, {
	
	process: function(serviceRecord, mode) {
		if (mode == 'SCHEDULED')
			return;
		
		var metadata = serviceRecord.metadata;
		var levels;
		if (metadata) {
			var metadataJson = new JSON().decode(metadata);
			levels = metadataJson.levels;
		}
		
		if (!levels)
			levels = GlideProperties.getInt('svc.manual.convert.levels.default_value', 3);

		var serviceId = serviceRecord.getUniqueValue();
		var bsm = new SNC.BusinessServiceManager();
		var blackListRelations = gs.getProperty("sa.mapping.system.manual.rel_type.blacklist","");
		if (!bsm.populateDiscoveredService(serviceId, parseInt(levels), blackListRelations)) {
			throw 'Failed to populate service. ' + bsm.error;
		}
	},

    type: 'SMDynamicManualServicePopulator'
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2019-07-23 04:42:41</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>11f01e3dc3f23300daa79624a1d3ae32</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>SMDynamicManualServicePopulator</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Application Service" source="com.snc.cmdb.it_service">72b4cdcf6da620100acb70b353433039</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_11f01e3dc3f23300daa79624a1d3ae32</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2019-12-10 14:21:33</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>892</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
